pages.title: ORSA Wellness Protocol
pages.text: ORSA recognizes that extended solo operations in hostile environments may result in psychological strain. This is normal. You are not going crazy. Probably.$(br2)Field-tested coping mechanisms include: talking to yourself, naming your tools, and crafting small plush companions from available materials. ORSA does NOT endorse emotional attachment to inanimate objects. ORSA DOES note a 23% reduction in incident reports among personnel who carry one.
A plush penguin. Holds up well in cold environments, for obvious reasons.
Certified emotional support animal. Does not judge you. Cannot judge you. Is wool.
The closest living relative of the elephant. Somehow. ORSA Zoology Division cannot explain this either.
